name: Pink Parot (Twitch Chat Translator)
description:
simple windows system tray translate bot 

when auto mode off use with & or ＆ character

enter bot username and bot oauth in settings.txt - You can generate oauth from https://twitchapps.com/tmi

enter your channel name 

ready!

Pink Parot has no auto update sorry! go to https://camenduru.itch.io/pinkparot and check latest version

for more dev https://www.twitch.tv/camenduru
